Description: This guitar is in mint condition. It comes with the original Hiscox case as well as all the case candy.Mayones instruments are the perfect mixture of dedication, passion & professionalism. Highly experienced luthiers create, in collaboration with professional musicians, such as John Browne (Monuments) or Ruud Jolie (Within Temptation), perfect work-horses with a distinct elegance. With 35 years of tradition, Mayones has created extraordinary models like this Mayones Regius 7 Core Classic.The Regius Core is an archtop variant of the Regius, Mayones' flagship model. It is a luxurious neck-through-body instrument, with superb stability and sustain and a very ergonomic double cutaway design. The carving of the arched top has more distinct contours than the slightly more rounded off looks of the Regius Core Classic.Specs: Hand selected 5A quilt top Abalone face dots Pearloid black binding Mahogany neck through construction with 11ply neck Upgrade khaya mahogany wings Schaller Hanes bridge BKP nailbomb bridge, painkiller neck Hipshot O ring volume knob 3 way selector Push pull coil split Gloss top satin back finish Ebony board Hipshot locking tuners Stainless steel frets
Title: Mayones Regius Core 6 2018 Transparent Dirty Green Burst
